definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Either you believe in freedom and middle class trade policies or you dont.
sentences.chinese: 不管你信不信自由和中产阶级贸易政策。

sentences.english: One on offer . In India the poor, proportionately, are more likely to vote.
sentences.chinese: 按比例来说，印度的穷人比中产阶级更乐于参加投票。

sentences.english: So the term “middle class” covers a multitude of differences.
sentences.chinese: 因此，“中产阶级”这个术语涵盖了众多的差异。

sentences.english: The banks tend to employ only white middle-class men.
sentences.chinese: 银行总是只招聘中产阶级的白人男士。

sentences.english: It was a litany of middle-class lives shattered by the recession.
sentences.chinese: 这是中产阶级因经济萧条而为生活发出的祈祷。
中产阶级的破产者将越来越多。

sentences.english: Millions of middle-class Chinese have gambled on buying new apartments.
sentences.chinese: 数百万的中国中产阶级买房就像赌博。

sentences.english: The Nobel committee called George Babbitt the popular hero of the American middle class.
sentences.chinese: 诺贝尔委员会称，主人公巴比特是中产阶级的偶像。

sentences.english: After all, she was born into the Georgia bourgeoisie, a milieu rarely thought of as action-packed.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，她生于乔治亚州的中产阶级，能有什么壮举呢？

sentences.english: Wealth creates what has historically been the social backbone of democracy: a middle class.
sentences.chinese: 财富创造了历来就是民主的社会支柱的中产阶级。

sentences.english: Here they had been trying to create a weekend idyll for the urban middle classes.
sentences.chinese: 他们曾试图让城市中产阶级在周末来这里享受农家乐。

sentences.english: "There is a competitive streak in this generation of middle-class parents, " she says.
sentences.chinese: 这一代中产阶级的父母中有一种竞争的倾向。

sentences.english: Holton was born in New York, a wealthy middle-class families.
sentences.chinese: 霍尔顿出身在纽约一个富裕的中产阶级的家庭。

sentences.english: How is marriage faring among the black middle class?
sentences.chinese: 在黑人中产阶级家庭中婚姻又是一种什么状况？

sentences.english: In this middle age, the West built a middle class.
sentences.chinese: 在这种中间时代，西方人构建了中产阶级。

sentences.english: As China boomed, the ranks of the middle class swelled.
sentences.chinese: 中国经济兴旺的时候，中产阶级膨胀。

definition: Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
